Control Name: 5.4.2 DevOps security guidance based on industry lessons-learned, and available automation tools (OWASP guidance, Microsoft toolkit for Secure DevOps etc.) is leveraged.
Control Statement: Organizations should leverage a control framework such as NIST, CIS or ASB (Azure Security Benchmarks) for securing applications on the cloud rather than starting from zero.
